abstract: As a new bout of fear gripped the financial markets, stocks fell sharply again, and the credit markets seized up as confidence in the nation’s financial system ebbed.
snippet: As a new bout of fear gripped the financial markets, stocks fell sharply again, and the credit markets seized up as confidence in the nation’s financial system ebbed.
lead_paragraph: As a new bout of fear gripped the financial markets, stocks fell sharply again on Thursday, continuing a months-long plunge that has wiped out the gains of the last decade.

headline.main: Stocks Drop Sharply and Credit Markets Seize Up
headline.print_headline: Stocks Drop Sharply and Credit Markets Seize Up

byline.original: By Vikas Bajaj and Jack Healy
